segments.text: Rachel has decided to quit smoking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You never guess she is going to have a baby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's unbelievable . She is such a chain smoker .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , yes . She said she is going to stop drinking coffee too and quit all the unhealthy habits just for the baby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , she is going to be a great mother .
segments.speaker: S2
